purpose: Facilitates the integration and operation of multiple AI agents within financial and blockchain networks.
principle: Builds on a Model Context Protocol (MCP) to coordinate AI agents for blockchain operations.
reusability: Offers composable APIs and modular architecture for integrating with various blockchain networks.
limitations: Primarily focused on blockchain interactions, may require customization for non-blockchain applications.
name: lyraios
description: LYRAI is a Model Context Protocol (MCP) operating system for multi-AI AGENTs designed to extend the functionality of AI applications by enabling them to interact with financial networks and blockchain public chains. The server offers a range of advanced AI assistants, including blockchain public chain operations (SOLANA,ETH,BSC,etc.)
highlight: Enables advanced AI agents to interact with financial networks and blockchain public chains.
